full_summary:
### Organization Design and Classification Consultant

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01026857
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** February 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 16, 2023 2:00 PM

**Notice Description:**

Elections Canada requires the services of a consultant with extensive experience in organizational design and job description evaluation for executive and/or non-executive positions in the federal public service. The successful candidate will assist in evaluating and classifying jobs and associated reports/documentation to support the delivery of classification services within the agency.

The work is currently not being performed by a contractor, and security requirements include minimum corporate security of DOS - Reliability and minimum resource security of Reliability status.

The contract period will be from the Effective Date of the Contract for one (1) year, with options to extend the period of the Contract by 2 additional periods of 12 months each under the same terms and conditions.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Proposals are to be addressed to the attention of the Contracting Authority and delivered, sealed, to the Proposal Receiving Unit on or before the bid closing date and time indicated on the front page of the RFP.
* Bidders may use the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to transmit their proposals electronically.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Communication:**

* All enquiries and other communication with Elections Canada personnel are to be directed ONLY to the Contracting Authority. The Contracting Authority will be the bidder's primary contact.
* Enquiries must be submitted in writing to proposal@elections.ca no later than the deadline indicated in the RFP.

**Invitation to Bid:**

* This RFP is open only to Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS for the following categories:
	+ Stream 1 – Category Organizational Design and Classification Consultant – Level 3 (Senior)
	+ Stream 1 – Category Organizational Design and Classification Consultant – Level 3 (Senior)
	+ Stream 1 – Category Organizational Design and Classification Consultant – Level 3 (Senior)
* Estimated level of effort: 220 days
* Estimated number of contracts to be awarded: up to 3
* Bidders may submit a bid for one or all resource categories.

**Trade Agreements:**

* This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade
